com.colorful.atom.beans
Class Entry

java.lang.Object
  com.colorful.atom.beans.Entry

public class Entry
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an Atom 1.0 entry element.

Author:
Bill Brown 
      atomEntry =
          element atom:entry {
          atomCommonAttributes,
          (atomAuthor*
          & atomCategory*
          & atomContent?
          & atomContributor*
          & atomId
          & atomLink*
          & atomPublished?
          & atomRights?
          & atomSource?
          & atomSummary?
          & atomTitle
          & atomUpdated
          & extensionElement*)
          }
See Also:
Atom Syndication Format
